hero.title: Your Personal Cannabis Journey, Demystified.
hero.subtitle: CannaLog is a mindful companion for tracking, understanding, and optimizing your cannabis experiences. Gain insights, find what works for you, and cultivate well-being.

features.title: Your Journey, Illuminated
features.paragraph1: CannaLog is more than a journal; it's your personal cartographer for the cannabis landscape. We help you connect the dots between cultivar, dosage, and your state of mind, transforming subjective feelings into actionable insights. By mindfully charting your sessions, you move beyond guesswork and start making intentional choices that truly enhance your well-being.
features.paragraph2: Discover which terpenes uplift your creativity or what timing promotes restful sleep. Our intuitive tools empower you to build a personalized routine that is both effective and mindful.

toolkit.title: A Toolkit for Your Well-being
toolkit.subtitle: CannaLog is more than an app; it's a powerful companion designed to help you track, understand, and optimize your personal cannabis experience with clarity and ease.

logging.title: Mindful Session Logging
logging.description: Easily record every detail—from cultivar and dosage to your mood and activities. Track what matters to you in just a few taps.

insights.title: Personalized Insights
insights.description: Uncover your personal patterns. Our smart analytics help you understand which strains and doses best suit your wellness goals, from sleep to creativity.

explore.title: Explore & Discover
explore.description: Dive into our extensive library to learn about different strains, cannabinoids, and terpenes. Find new products that align with your desired effects.

tracking.title: Symptom Tracking
tracking.description: Monitor how cannabis affects specific symptoms or conditions. See your progress over time with clear, easy-to-read charts and summaries.

security.title: Secure & Private
security.description: Your journal is your own. Your data is encrypted and stored securely, ensuring your personal cannabis journey remains completely private.

reminders.title: Custom Reminders
reminders.description: Stay consistent with your wellness routine. Set custom reminders to log your sessions, take your dosage, or simply take a moment to reflect.

cta.title: Start for free today!
cta.subtitle: There's no catch - it's completely free to get started. No credit card required.

register.title: Join CannaLog Today
register.description: Sign up to start your journey with CannaLog and discover the power of mindful cannabis session logging.
register.subtitle: Begin your journey with CannaLog and unlock the potential of intentional cannabis session tracking.
register.heading: Create an account
register.successMessage: Account created successfully! Please check your email and click the verification link to activate your account. After verification, you can sign in.

errors.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions

confirm.successMessage: Email verified successfully! You can now sign in.
confirm.failureMessage: Email verification failed. The link may be expired or invalid.
confirm.networkError: Failed to verify email. Please try again or contact support.
confirm.missingToken: Invalid verification link. Missing verification token.

verifyEmail.title: Email Verification - CannaLog
verifyEmail.heading: Email Verification
verifyEmail.successMessage: Email verified successfully! You can now sign in to your account.
verifyEmail.failureMessage: Email verification failed. The link may be expired or invalid.
verifyEmail.networkError: Failed to verify email. Please try again or contact support.
verifyEmail.missingToken: Invalid verification link. Missing verification token.

errors.checkCredentials: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.
errors.authRequired: Please sign in to access this page

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Welcome to your personal cannabis journey dashboard. Here you can track your sessions, view insights, and manage your profile.
dashboard.welcomeMessage: ! Here's an overview of your CannaLog.

recentEntries.title: Recent Entries
recentEntries.description: You have added 3 new strain reviews this week. Keep up the great work!

inventory.description: You are running low on 'Blue Dream'. Only 2 grams remaining.

discover.title: Discover
discover.description: Check out strains with similar terpene profiles to your favorites.

profile.subtitle: Manage your account information and settings

404.subtitle: Something's missing.
